description: Try our easy to follow Wonderful Double Choc Berry Trifle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Wonderful Double Choc Berry Trifle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225 g round sponge or fruit cake

recipeInstructions.text: Finish off with remaining dark chocolate custard and decorate with remaining berries. Dust with icing sugar if desired. Prep Time: 30 mins (plus setting time for jelly).
